late-adulthood.title: Approaching retirement
late-adulthood.summary: As you get older and your needs change, there may be benefits available to help you with expenses, health care, and other new challenges.
late-adulthood.eligibilityCriteriaDescri: Please check the boxes and select the options that best describe your situation. Answer as many questions as possible for the most accurate results.

late-adulthood.eligibilityCriteria.label: About you (the person applying for benefits)
